title: Valles Caldera National Preserve: Fishing Guides
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Fishing     Fishing Guides                Permitted Fishing Guides       The following organizations are permitted to provide commercial fishing guide services. All fees and arrangements are made through the fishing guides.  Land of Enchantment Guides Land of Enchantment Guides is an ORVIS endorsed fly fishing guide service offering guided day trips. Experienced fly fishing guides will do their best to ensure you have fun along with the chance to develop and improve your fly fishing skills. Beginners to expert anglers are welcome. Fishing gear is provided. Lunch, snacks, and drinks are included on full day trips. Phone: (505) 629-5688 or (505) 927-5356 Website: www.loeflyfishing.com Email: trout@loeflyfishing.com
